name: Velocity VR Battle Royale
description:
Shoot Slice Climb Hit Demolish
In Velocity you appear on an island, wake up and find your self in my simulation ready to survive and log out before the server crashes. Only way to leave is to win or die trying.

Immerse your self with Physics


Destroy anything in your path


Climb anything to get the advantage


Real feeling reloads


Main Game Features

*Physic Based Interaction
*Destruction
*Real Gun Loading System
*Climb anything
